articles.title: Stock Market Today: Nasdaq Jumps As Microsoft Hits $4 Trillion Mark; Biotech Name Leaps (Live Coverage) - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Stock Market Today: The Dow Jones index climbed Tuesday as the Fed policy meeting kicked off. Microsoft and Apple hit huge milestones.
